reviews.review: I want to deeply thank the developer of this application, it is helping me to be productive like I have never been in my entire life and to make the most of every moment of my day. The event widget is incredible for tracking the day's progress, the interface is intuitive, has few ads and is easy to use, I recommend it to everyone! You can download without fear of being happy!

Really useful and unique 'year progress' countdown timers, along with custom events. I particularly like the all-in-one circular widget which looks great on my home screen. The only change I would like is a larger text option

This app is exactly what I've been looking for! It's fantastic to see the year's progress visualized as a percentage, with widgets that keep it constantly in view. It's a real eye-opener to how quickly time passes. This is a brilliant concept, well-executed by the developer. Thank you for creating such a helpful tool!
